channel.title: My .jar connects to my server my webclient doesn't!
channel.description: Hello everyone, I just jarred and signed my new webclient, put the html file up etc. Now When I run the .jar it works and connects fine, and when I try it on my site it can't connect to my server, what's wrong?

item.title: My .jar connects to my server my webclient doesn't!
item.dc:creator: @artego artego
item.description:
@artego wrote:

Hello everyone, I just jarred and signed my new webclient, put the html file up etc. Now When I run the .jar it works and connects fine, and when I try it on my site it can’t connect to my server, what’s wrong?

Read full topic
